title: Salt Armour Face Mask Shield Protective Balaclava Bandana MicroFiber Tube Neck Warmer - Blackout American Flag
description: SA Co. Face Shield tubular bandanas offer style and sun protection without weighing you down. Face Shield tubular bandanas can be worn MULTIPLE WAYS! Lightweight and comfortable, our Face Shields wick away moisture, dry quickly and breathe well. They can be worn more than 10 different ways—from a beanie to a headband to a hair tie. You’ll be amazed by how effectively it reduces skin temperature and helps maintain hydration to keep you fresh and ready while outdoors. Soft, Breathable 100% Polyester Microfiber 100% Seamless 10+ Ways to Wear Repels Moisture SPF40 Stain Resistant Odor Control Protects Against Wind Helps Maintain Hydration Quick-Drying 2-Way Lateral Stretch Product Dimensions: (approx.) 10.5 x 20.5 inches Weight: 1.3 ounces One Size Fits All Adults Machine Washable Air Dry Do Not Iron Lifetime Warranty on all Face Shields
